product_name: Outdoor Research Equinox Cargo Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight, quick-drying and sun-blocking, the men's Outdoor Research Equinox Cargo Shorts are built for hiking and travel in hot, dry deserts or the humid tropics. 100% Supplex(R) nylon is supple and lightweight; offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Durable water repellent finish beads up moisture so it rolls off. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Cargo pockets with flaps, back pockets with concealed zippers, and hand pockets are all mesh-lined and hold lots of gear. Outdoor Research Equinox Cargo Shorts for men feature a snap and zip-fly front, and loops for your own belt. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight, quick-drying and sun-blocking, the men's Outdoor Research Equinox Cargo Shorts are built for hiking and travel in hot, dry deserts or the humid tropics.
